1010000110000111 0000011111100010 0 -> sum: 1010100101101001, cout: 0
0011010000101011 0011011001101111 1 -> sum: 0110101010011011, cout: 0
1111000000001011 0011010001111000 1 -> sum: 0010010010000100, cout: 1
1000000000110000 0000001011001001 0 -> sum: 1000001011111001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
